title: Runes disappearing. Please RIOT fix this issue.
body:
Hello. Im having this issue coming up very often lately
When i launch the client and go for a game (i always forget to check before) during selection screen i notice that all my runes arent there.
Only the default ones. Its the 5th time it happens randomly.
Can you guys please investigate and fix this?

Thank you.

replies.body:
I'm seeing this weird rune page issue pop up a bit more often lately. A lot of times this can be fixed by making sure your connection is stable, since rune page data is saved server side similar to config settings. Try updating your DNS to 8.8.8.8/8.8.4.4 for a smoother route to the servers. 

It really sucks, but you'll have to setup those pages again since they were lost.
